def_cn: 可自由参加的活动;众人同时争抢的情形
def_en: A free-for-all is a situation in which several people or groups are trying to get something for themselves and there are no controls on how they do it.

def_cn: 混战;群架;众人都参与的争吵
def_en: A free-for-all is a disorganized fight or argument which lots of people join in.
